term_text.header: Real Estate Board of Greater Vancouver(REBGV)
term_text.body:
You are agreeing to comply and be bound by the following terms of service and use.

the Registrant has received, read and understood the brochure published by the British Columbia Real Estate Association entitled “Privacy Notice and Consent” ;

the Registrant acknowledges entering into a lawful REALTOR®/ consumer or REALTOR®/client relationship with the Member;

all data obtained from the MLS® VOW is intended for and may only be used for the Registrant’s personal, non-commercial use;

the Registrant has a bona fide interest in the purchase, sale or lease of real estate of the type being offered through the MLS® VOW;

the Registrant will not himself, and will not permit or assist others to, directly or indirectly: (i) copy, redistribute or retransmit any of the MLS® VOW Data or information provided;

copy, redistribute or retransmit any of the MLS® VOW Data or information provided;
display, post, disseminate, distribute, publish, broadcast, transfer, sell or sublicense any of the MLS® VOW Data to another person.
engage in Scraping (including “screen scraping” and “database scraping”), “data mining” or any other activity intended to collect, store, re-organize, summarize or manipulate any MLS® VOW Data or any related data;
the Registrant acknowledges the Board’s ownership of, and the validity of the Board’s proprietary rights and copyright in the MLS® VOW Data, and listing information; and

the Registrant expressly authorizes the Board or their duly authorized representatives, to access the MLS® VOW and Registrant’s information provided to the MLS® VOW Participant, for the purposes of verifying compliance with and pursuing enforcement of the Terms of Use and all applicable rules, regulations, bylaws, policies, and laws.

term_text.header: Pillar 9™(Alberta One Realty Listing Services Inc.)
term_text.body:
You are agreeing to comply and be bound by the following terms of service and use.

Agree not copy, redistribute, or retransmit any of the VOW Content, except in connection with the VOW Customer’s consideration of the purchase or sale of an individual property.

Acknowledges the Association’s ownership of and the validity of the Association’s copyrights in the MLS® System data.

Despite the preceding provisions, the MLS®, Association and other Members and their duly authorized representatives may access the VOW for the purposes of verifying compliance with these Regional MLS® Rules and monitoring display of other Members’ listings by the VOW.

Information is deemed reliable but is not guaranteed accurate by Pillar 9™.

By using this website, you agree to comply with and be bound by the following terms of service and use:

1. You acknowledge that these Terms of Use do not establish an agency relationship with the Participant.

2. All data obtained from the Virtual Office Website (VOW) is intended solely for your personal, non-commercial use.

3. You certify that you have a bona fide interest in the purchase, sale, or lease of real estate of the type being offered through the VOW.

4. You agree not to copy, redistribute, or retransmit any of the VOW Content, except in connection with your consideration of the purchase or sale of an individual property.

5. You acknowledge the Cooperative ownership of and the validity of the copyright in the MLS® System database.

You are agreeing to comply and be bound by the following terms of service and use.

i. That the registered user has received, read, and understands the brochure published by the Real Estate Council of BC (RECBC) entitled "Disclosure of Representation in Trading Services";

ii. That all data obtained from the VOW is intended only for the registered user's personal, non-commercial use;

iii. That the registered user has a bona fide interest in the purchase, sale, or lease of real estate of the type being offered through the VOW;

iv. That the registered user will not copy, redistribute, or retransmit any of the Licensed Data or information provided; and

v. That the registered user acknowledges the Boards’ copyright in the Licensed Data.

vi. A Terms of Use (TOU) agreement may not impose a financial obligation on a client or create an agency agreement with a client.

Privacy Policy:

By using our services, you agree that we may collect and use your information for the purpose of enabling log-in access and to contact you for inquiries related to real estate. This usage complies with all applicable laws, including the requirements of the Personal Information Protection Act.

house.contact_message: I'd like to buy/sell something similar to: [40671452], 18 Merritt Crescent, Grimsby
house.schedule_message: I want to book an appointment to view: [40671452], 18 Merritt Crescent, Grimsby
house.direct_contact_message: I want to know more about your toured listing: [40671452], 18 Merritt Crescent, Grimsby

description1.name: Description
description1.value: Presenting 18 Merritt Crescent, a large 4-level backsplit property with an in-ground heated pool, 5+2 bedrooms and 2 full baths, just waiting for you to call it home. Featuring an incredible kitchen and dining room with stainless steel appliances, custom cabinetry and gorgeous granite countertops, a good size primary bedroom with ensuite privileges, a large family room with big windows and a cozy fireplace and access to your amazing private backyard with an in-ground heated pool and exposed aggregate concrete. This property is tastefully updated and thoughtfully designed. With its separate entrance to the lower two levels and it's extra bedrooms, it is the perfect home for multi-generational living, in-law suite potential or savvy homeowners seeking mortgage relief. Only a couple minutes walking distance to schools, places of worship, Peach King arena and community centre and the downtown core. There is also a beautiful park only a couple doors down! You have to see it to believe it, what a property!

summary.name: Summary
value: The property is located at 18 Merritt Crescent.
The property has 5 bedrooms and 2 additional bedrooms, totaling 7 bedrooms.
The property features a large kitchen with stainless steel appliances, custom cabinetry, and granite countertops.
The primary bedroom has an ensuite and is a good size.
The property is located near schools, places of worship, and the downtown core.

school.name: Our Lady of Fatima Catholic Elementary School (GR)

value.name: Feature
value.value: Auto Garage Door Remote(s),  Central Vacuum,  In-law Capability

value.name: Appliances Included
value.value: Dishwasher, Dryer, Microwave, Pool Equipment, Refrigerator, Stove, Washer, Window Coverings, Wine Cooler

value.name: Driveway Parking
